path - Variable in class pimperium.elements.Sector
Path of the image corresponding to the sector
pimperium - module pimperium
This module contains the game Pocket Imperium playable with a Javafx interface
pimperium.commands - package pimperium.commands
This package contains the interface Command and all the Command Cards available in the game.
pimperium.controllers - package pimperium.controllers
This package contains the Game Controller (respecting the VCM design pattern)
pimperium.elements - package pimperium.elements
This package contains all the elements relative to the game of Pocket Imperium (Sectors, Hexagons and Ships)
pimperium.models - package pimperium.models
This package contains the Model (according to the VCM design pattern)
pimperium.players - package pimperium.players
This package contains all possible types of players for the game Pocket Imperium
pimperium.utils - package pimperium.utils
This package contains utility classes used from different types of classes
pimperium.views - package pimperium.views
This package contains the View (According th$o the VCM design pattern), ie all the windows used by the interface
